snippet: Friday’s statement was a notable turn from the sparse bulletins from his caretakers since Schumacher, the Grand Prix driver, suffered severe brain injuries while skiing in December.
abstract: Grand Prix racing legend Michael Schumacher, who has been in a coma for three months following skiing accident, shows moderate signs of improvement, including moments of consciousness.
lead_paragraph: Friday’s statement was a notable turn from the sparse bulletins from his caretakers since Schumacher, the Grand Prix driver, suffered severe brain injuries while skiing in December.

headline.main: Michael Schumacher Is Said to Have ‘Moments of Consciousness’
